name: Super Unverified Land
description:
Super Unverified Land

Who needs to be verified on Twitter when you've got games to play? Collect "Blue  Checks" and survive perilous levels in this super short, fast paced platformer!

GAME CONTROLS

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Jump: c / j / Space
  • Dash: x / k

GAME ENGINE

Pocket Platformer https://the-l0bster.itch.io/pocket-platformer

Game Jam: https://itch.io/jam/pocket-platformer-halloween-jam

MUSIC

"Inspired" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
